pr_title: HBASE-25084 Add "regexstringnocase" to ParseFilter for case-insensitivity

timeline.bodyText: Not your fault but usually we capitalize static variable names. This is ok for now. We can change in another PR
timeline.author: saintstack
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -244,6 +244,13 @@
   public static final byte [] regexStringType = new byte [] {'r','e','g','e', 'x',
                                                              's','t','r','i','n','g'};
 
+  /**
+   * RegexStringNoCaseType byte array
+   */
+  public static final byte [] regexStringNoCaseType = new byte [] {'r','e','g','e','x',

replies.bodyText: Yep, let's do it on a next PR. Let me merge this now,.
replies.author: wchevreuil
